body.raw:
{
    "adaptationName": "Light-Novel",
    "briefSummary": "The original story.",
    "rating": "4.6/5 on webnovel",
    "creators": "Author: Butterfly Blue, Translator: Nomyummi, Editor: Nomyummi & GravityTales More",
    "length": "1728 chapters",
    "fullSummary": "The novel recounts the whole journey of the protagonist, Ye Xiu, from his forced retirement, to the beginnings of a new team, to his battles in the pro league and, finally, to his 4th and final championship.",
    "extraInformation": "Highly recommended, Translated version can be read on webnovel.com, Original name: Quanzhi Gaoshou",
    "imageAddress": "https://www.nightcomic.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/300.jpg"
}

{
    "adaptationName": "Live-Action",
    "briefSummary": "Live-Action adaptation starring Yang Yang.",
    "rating": "8.1/10 on imdb",
    "creators": "Author: Butterfly Blue, Director: Shiyi Yue, Writers: Qiao Bingqing & Hu Dielan",
    "length": "1 season of 40 episodes, 45 minutes each",
    "fullSummary": "In the online game Glory, Ye Xiu is regarded as a textbook and a top-tier pro-player. However, due to a myriad of reasons, he is kicked from the team. After leaving the professional scene, he finds work in an Internet Cafe as a manager.",
    "extraInformation": "Least recommended, Available with English subtitles on Netflix, Original name: Quanzhi Gaoshou",
    "imageAddress": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/f/f1/The_King%27s_Avatar_%282019_web_series%29_poster.jpg"
}

{
    "adaptationName": "Donghua",
    "briefSummary": "Chinese animation adaptation.",
    "rating": "7.9/10 on myanimelist",
    "creators": "Author: Butterfly Blue, Producer: bilibili & Tencent Penguin",
    "length": "2 seasons (12 episodes each) plus 4 extra episodes of 23 minutes each",
    "fullSummary": "The first season recounts his start in the internet cafe where we meet most of the team. The extras cover the first all-stars where his identity is revealed and the second season covers everything up until just before the challenger league.",
    "extraInformation": "Highly recommended, Available on crunchyroll.com, Original name: Quanzhi Gaoshou",
    "imageAddress": "https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIyMjE5ZDYtMTQxNC00NTEzLTgwYzYtMmM0NDg3OWFlYWM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjMxNzQ2NTQ@._V1_.jpg"
}

{
    "adaptationName": "Manhua",
    "briefSummary": "Chinese comic adaptation.",
    "rating": "4.8/5 on webnovel",
    "creators": "Author: Butterfly Blue, Translator: Nomyummi, Editor: Nomyummi & GravityTales More",
    "length": "96 chapters, Ongoing",
    "fullSummary": "Despite all its chapters, it hasn't covered much from the original story. After getting a job at the internet cafe, he spends his days playing Glory and earning the wrath of the guilds. He and his party are hunted and ambushed by them.",
    "extraInformation": "Switches from manga to manhua format halfway through, Available on webnovel.com, Original name: Quanzhi Gaoshou",
    "imageAddress": "https://img.webnovel.com/bookcover/17959825305729101/300/300.jpg"
}
